phrase.cizu_name: be (或 be caught) in a cleft stick

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly Brit.)be in a situation in which any action one takes will have adverse consequences

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English clift: of Germanic origin; related to Dutch kluft and German Kluft, also to cleave. The form of the word was altered in the 16th cent. by association with cleft

entry.tran: (石头或地面的)罅隙，裂隙，裂口
entry.def: A cleft in a rock or in the ground is a narrow opening in it.

example.ex: ...a narrow cleft in the rocks too small for humans to enter.
example.tran: 岩石之间人无法通过的一条窄缝

entry.def: A cleft in someone's chin is a line down the middle of it.
If someone has a cleft chin, they have a cleft in their chin.

entry.tran: 左右为难的；进退维谷的
entry.def: If you say that a person or organization is in a cleft stick, you mean that they are in a difficult situation which will bring them problems and harm whatever they decide to do.
Cleft is a past participle of cleave.

means.word_mean: 1. a split or indentation in something (as the palate or chin)
2. having one or more incisions reaching nearly to the midrib

auth_sentence.content: Facebook also nixes pictures showing the gluteal cleft.
auth_sentence.res_content: Facebook also nixes pictures showing the gluteal cleft.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Facebook also nixes pictures showing the gluteal cleft.

auth_sentence.content: I was bullied at school because of my cleft palate.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was bullied at school because of my cleft palate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was bullied at school because of my cleft palate.

auth_sentence.content: To use his own words, he was in a cleft stick.
auth_sentence.res_content: To use his own words, he was in a cleft stick.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To use his own words, he was in a cleft stick.

sentences.en: Their baby had an operation to repair a cleft palate.
sentences.cn: 他们的宝宝接受了兔唇整形手术。

sentences.en: I was in a cleft stick—my job was boring but I couldn’t move to another firm without losing my company pension.
sentences.cn: 我进退两难—我的工作十分无聊，可是如果我跳槽到另一家公司，原来交的退休金就白交了。
